Uses of Interface
com.gsma.android.mobileconnect.token.TokenListener

Packages that use TokenListener
com.gsma.android.mobileconnect.token   
 

Uses of TokenListener in com.gsma.android.mobileconnect.token
 

Methods in com.gsma.android.mobileconnect.token with parameters of type TokenListener
 void Token.refreshingToken(java.lang.String tokenUri, java.lang.String refreshToken, java.lang.String scope, java.lang.String clientId, java.lang.String clientSecret, TokenListener listener)
          Handles the refresh process and will return a new access token if successful as well as marking the old access token and refresh token as revoked.
 void Token.revokingAccessToken(java.lang.String tokenUri, java.lang.String accessToken, java.lang.String clientId, java.lang.String clientSecret, TokenListener listener)
          Handles the revocation process and if successful marking the old access token and any associated refresh token as revoked.
 void Token.tokenFromAuthorizationCode(java.lang.String tokenUri, java.lang.String code, java.lang.String clientId, java.lang.String clientSecret, java.lang.String returnUri, TokenListener listener)
          Exchanges an authorization code for an access token which can be used to authenticate access to services.
